neighbors.name: Merlin Bailey Trustee Merlin M Bailey Living Trust
neighbors.claims: The Merlin M. Bailey Living Trust is the recorded owner of multiple parcels in Spotsylvania County, including PINs 44A-10B, 44A-10C, and 44A-10D [Spotsylvania County Assessment Office](https://www.spotsylvania.va.us/505/2025-Assessment-Search). Parcel 44A-10D corresponds to the property at 8840 Pamunkey Road, which consists of approximately 11.13 acres [Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/8840-Pamunkey-Rd-Spotsylvania-VA-22551/64428468_zpid/). Public records associate the Bailey Living Trust with a Spotsylvania mailing address in the 22551 zip code area [King William County Land Book 2020](https://www.kwc.gov/DocumentCenter/View/1116/2020LandBookCounty). There is no record of commercial development projects or active business operations associated with these specific tax parcels [Spotsylvania County Assessment Office](https://www.spotsylvania.va.us/505/2025-Assessment-Search). Searches of local news archives and public meeting minutes yielded no results indicating the trust or its trustee has taken a public stance on renewable energy or land use development in the county [Fredericksburg Free Lanceâ€“Star](https://fredericksburg.com).
neighbors.influence_justification: Entity appears to be a private family landholding trust with no documented political involvement, board memberships, or public advocacy roles in Spotsylvania County.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the trustee via mail at the registered address, focusing on the preservation of the rural character of the Pamunkey Road area and providing assurances regarding visual buffers.

neighbors.profile_summary: Private landholding trust owning multiple parcels on Pamunkey Road; no evidence of commercial activity or political advocacy.

neighbors.verification_notes: Removed specific age reference ('80+ year old') as it could not be verified in current public records and may be based on outdated or mismatched data. Confirmed existence of Bailey Living Trust in Spotsylvania via cross-reference with King William County land books (Source 90). Verified PIN 44A-10D maps to 8840 Pamunkey Rd (Source 19/30).
